channel.title: startup weekend on Damien Saunders
channel.description: Recent content in startup weekend on Damien Saunders

item.title: London Startup Weekend will be back
item.description: So London Startup Weekend will happen … it has taken a lot longer to get the next weekend event going then we all thought. To be honest, Startup Weekend takes time and patience – patiently working with venue sponsors, helping them to gain internal approval and working through security issues. Patience takes time .. so the next Startup Weekend will be happening soon. We’ve now got a team of about 6 people to work on London Startup Weekend and hopefully soon we’ll have a venue to really consider.

item.title: Announcing Cambridge Startup Weekend December 10 – 12
item.description: Cambridge Startup Weekend (http://cambridge.startupweekend.org) will take place December 10 – 11 – 12 2010 in just over 6 weeks at the Hauser Forum in Cambridge.Startup Weekend is the place to come for anyone with a new idea that they want to see brought to life. Over the weekend teams work together to take the ideas and create real new ventures. Anyone with an idea or interest in being an entrepreneur is welcome.

item.title: London Startup Weekend June 4 – 6 tickets on sale
item.description: Damien Saunders is organising the next London Startup Weekend (http://london.startupweekend.org) @startuplondon which will take place June 4 – 5 – 6 2010 in just under a month at the IBM offices on London’s Southbank. Getting around to organising a weekend like this is taking up a little bit of my time .. but I believe in the concept and the cause – and its going to be a great weekend!
